category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_significant_relation_types_for_Product
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relationship types that are considered when checking an Item Revision, or its subtypes, for changes. The default values are "TC_CAE_Target" (CAE Target Relationship), "TC_CAE_Include" (CAE Include Relationship), "TC_CAE_Defining" (CAE Defining Relationship).
